title: HUGEN 2073
text:
Software

Download and install R (https://www.r-project.org)
Download and install RStudio (https://posit.co/download/rstudio-desktop/)
Download, install, and configure GlobalProtect (follow the instructions here, including connecting to the VPN)

title: HUGEN 2073
text:
Help

Office hours TBD
Use the Canvas discussion board
